results.t: What is heat? | Definition from TechTarget
results.p: Heat is the transfer of thermal energy from one physical system to another system or from one region in a physical system to another region.
Jul 30, 2024 — Extreme heat is a period of high heat and humidity with temperatures above 90 degrees for at least two to three days.
